name: Space Salvagers
description: Are you ready to embark on an interdimensional adventure? In Space Salvagers, you'll join humanity's fight to collect valuable salvage from the wars of other alien civilizations. This salvage is crucial to our survival, as it drives human and AI science to new heights, propelling us forward on an exponential curve of technological advancement. But this is more than just a game of collecting resources, it's a race against time as you compete against other players to claim the most valuable salvage before it's gone. Join the ranks of the elite Space Salvagers and make your mark on the galaxy as you explore new dimensions and discover new technologies. Play Space Salvagers today and experience the thrill of interdimensional exploration.
